an4.95:2.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, chavalatam ubhato padittam, majjhe guthagatam, neva game katthattham pharati na aranne (…);
an4.95:2.2: tathupamaham, bhikkhave, imam puggalam vadami yvayam puggalo nevattahitaya patipanno no parahitaya.
an4.95:3.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvayam puggalo parahitaya patipanno no attahitaya, ayam imesam dvinnam puggalanam abhikkantataro ca panitataro ca.
an4.95:3.2: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvayam puggalo attahitaya patipanno no parahitaya, ayam imesam tinnam puggalanam abhikkantataro ca panitataro ca.
an4.95:3.3: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvayam puggalo attahitaya ceva patipanno parahitaya ca, ayam imesam catunnam puggalanam aggo ca settho ca pamokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca.
an4.95:4.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, gava khiram, khiramha dadhi, dadhimha navanitam, navanitamha sappi, sappimha sappimando, sappimando tattha aggamakkhayati;
an4.95:4.2: evamevam kho, bhikkhave, yvayam puggalo attahitaya ceva patipanno parahitaya ca, ayam imesam catunnam puggalanam aggo ca settho ca pamokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca.
an4.95:4.3: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmin”ti.
